titleStmt.title: Notes shewing how to get the angle of parallax of a comet or other phænomenon at two observations to be taken in any one station or place of the earth and thereby the distance from the earth / by R. Holland.
titleStmt.author: Holland, R. (Richard), 1596-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. Lichfield for Richard Davis,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
